main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed on 10 Oct 1957, described as bright white and gaucer shaped with no noise before disappearing into the clouds.
interesting points: The object was observed from Wibly, Colorado., The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes., The object had a bright white color and was gaucer-shaped with a point in front and back., The report suggested the shape might be similar to conventional aircraft., There were comments that the observation conclusion leans toward aircraft due to its characteristics.
witness description: Information not provided in the document.
